ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Ionospheric Connection Explorer (ICON) Thermosphere Ionosphere Electrodynamics General Circulation Model (TIEGCM) Model Product Version 2

RevisionEvent.Note: Updated metadata to version 2.7.0. Added DOI. JMW
Added MetadataRightsList and RightsList(s). Updated to 2.7.1. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: Thermosphere Ionosphere Electrodynamics General Circulation Model (TIEGCM) L4-3 with Hough Mode Extension (HME) forcing. These metadtaa include both the model input data and model output data.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: National Aeronautics and Space Administration; Dr. Astrid Maute; Dr. Thomas J. Immel

InformationURL.Name: Thermosphere-Ionosphere-Electrodynamics GeneralCirculation Model for the Ionospheric Connection Explorer: TIEGCM-ICON

Rights.Note: CC0 1.0 Universal is the Creative Commons license applicable to all publicly available NASA Heliophysics data products

AccessURL.Name: HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: Access to ICON TIEGCM L4 data at the Space Physics Data Facility (SPDF)

Rights.Note: CC0 1.0 Universal is the Creative Commons license applicable to all publicly available NASA Heliophysics data products

AccessURL.Name: HTTPS from CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Access to ICON TIEGCM L4 data at Coordinated Data Analysis Web (CDAWeb) Data Services

Parameter.Name: Total Density
Parameter.Description: Total neutral density. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, ilev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Eastward Electric Field
Parameter.Description: E_d1 see Richmond (1995) at 90km (magnetic eastward direction). This is a 3 dimensional array: 81x97x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (81x97x24): mlon, mlat, and time.

Parameter.Name: Equatorward Electric Field
Parameter.Description: Ed2 see Richmond (1995) at 90km (down-/equatorward direction). This is a 3 dimensional array: 81x97x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (81x97x24): mlon, mlat, and time.

Parameter.Name: Geographic Eastward Electric Field
Parameter.Description: Geographic eastward electric field on geographic grid. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Geographic Northward Electric Field
Parameter.Description: Geographic northward electric field on geographic grid. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Geographic Upward Electric Field
Parameter.Description: Geographic northward upward field on geographic grid. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Helium
Parameter.Description: Helium Mass mixing ratio. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Kp index
Parameter.Description: Kp index.

Parameter.Name: Lower Boundary Condition
Parameter.Description: Interface level of t,u,v lower boundary condition.

Parameter.Name: N2: Molecular Nitrogen
Parameter.Description: N2: Molecular Nitrogen. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: N(4S)
Parameter.Description: N(4S) Mass mixing ratio. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Electron Density
Parameter.Description: Electron density. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, ilev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Nitric Oxide
Parameter.Description: Nitric Oxide Mass mixing ratio. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Atomic Oxygen
Parameter.Description: Atomic oxygen Mass mixing ratio. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Neutral Molecule Oxygen
Parameter.Description: Neutral molecule oxygen Mass mixing ratio. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Molecule Oxygen Ion
Parameter.Description: O2+ ion Mass mixing ratio. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Atomic Oxygen Ion
Parameter.Description: O+ ion Mass mixing ratio. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Two Dimensinal Electric Potential
Parameter.Description: PHIM2D: 2d Electric Potential at 90 km on magnetic grid. This is a 3 dimensional array: 81x97x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (81x97x24): mlon, mlat, and time.

Parameter.Name: Prescribed High Latitude Potential
Parameter.Description: Prescribed high latitude potential (for L4.3 Weimer potential). This is a 3 dimensional array: 81x97x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (81x97x24): mlon, mlat, and time.

Parameter.Name: Electric Potential
Parameter.Description: Electric potential. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Aurora Ionization Rate
Parameter.Description: Aurora ionization rate. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Joule Heating
Parameter.Description: Joule heating. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Height-Integrated Joule Heating
Parameter.Description: Height-integrated joule heating. This is a 3 dimensional array: 144x72x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x24): lon, lat, and time.

Parameter.Name: Hall Conductivity
Parameter.Description: Hall Conductivity. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Pedersen Conductivity
Parameter.Description: Pedersen Conductivity. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Electron Temperature
Parameter.Description: Electron Temperature. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Ion Temperature
Parameter.Description: Ion Temperature. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Lower boundary condition of Neutral temperature
Parameter.Description: Lower boundary condition of Neutral temperature. This is a 3 dimensional array: 144x72x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x24): lon, lat, and time.

Parameter.Name: Lower boundary condition of Neutral temperature (previous timestep)
Parameter.Description: Lower boundary condition of Neutral temperature (previous timestep). This is a 3 dimensional array: 144x72x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x24): lon, lat, and time.

Parameter.Name: Neutral Temperature
Parameter.Description: Neutral Temperature. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, lev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Zonal ExB Velocity
Parameter.Description: UI: Zonal ExB Velocity (geographic eastward). This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, ilev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Lower boundary condition of zonal neutral wind
Parameter.Description: Lower boundary condition of Zonal neutral wind (UN). This is a 3 dimensional array: 144x72x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x24): lon, lat, and time.

Parameter.Name: Lower boundary condition of zonal neutral wind (previous timestep)
Parameter.Description: Lower boundary condition of Zonal neutral wind (UN) (previous timestep). This is a 3 dimensional array: 144x72x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x24): lon, lat, and time.

Parameter.Name: Neutral Zonal Wind (+EAST)
Parameter.Description: Neutral zonal wind (+East). This is a 3 dimensional array: 144x72x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x24): lon, lat, and time.

Parameter.Name: Meridional ExB Velocity
Parameter.Description: VI: Meridional (geographic northward) ExB Velocity. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, ilev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Lower boundary condition of Meridional neutral wind
Parameter.Description: Lower boundary condition of meridional neutral wind (VN). This is a 3 dimensional array: 144x72x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x24): lon, lat, and time.

Parameter.Name: Lower boundary condition of meridional neutral wind (previous timestep)
Parameter.Description: Lower boundary condition of meridional neutral wind (VN) (previous timestep). This is a 3 dimensional array: 144x72x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x24): lon, lat, and time.

Parameter.Name: Neutral Meridional Wind (+EAST)
Parameter.Description: Neutral meridional wind (+north). This is a 3 dimensional array: 144x72x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x24): lon, lat, and time.

Parameter.Name: Vertical ExB Velocity
Parameter.Description: WI: Vertical (geographic Upward) ExB Velocity. This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, ilev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Neutral Vertical Wind
Parameter.Description: Upward neutral wind (plus up) (note that the vertical dimension is using ilev). This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, ilev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Geopotential Height
Parameter.Description: Geopotential height (used in the code with constant gravity). This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, ilev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Geometric Height ZG
Parameter.Description: Geometric height (just postprocessing with variable gravity). This is a 4 dimensional array: 144x72x57x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (144x72x57x24): lon, lat, ilev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Geopotential height on magnetic grid
Parameter.Description: Geopotential height (constant gravity) on magnetic grid. This is a 4 dimensional array: 81x97x63x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (81x97x63x24): mlon, mlat, imlev, and time.

Parameter.Name: Lower magnetic auroral activity index
Parameter.Description: Lower magnetic auroral activity index.

Parameter.Name: Characteristic Maxwellian energy of polar cusp electrons
Parameter.Description: Characteristic Maxwellian energy of polar cusp electrons.

Parameter.Name: Characteristic Maxwellian energy of drizzle electrons
Parameter.Description: Characteristic Maxwellian energy of drizzle electrons.

Parameter.Name: AMIE NH data file
Parameter.Description: AMIE northern hemisphere data file that contains potential,energy flux, mean energy. This is a 2 dimensional array: 1024x24.

Parameter.Name: AMIE SH data file
Parameter.Description: AMIE southern hemisphere data file that contains potential,energy flux, mean energy. This is a 2 dimensional array: 1024x24.

Parameter.Name: Background LBC data file
Parameter.Description: background lbc data file (for L4.3 based on HWM07 and MSISE00) that contains T,U,Z. This is a 2 dimensional array: 1024x24.

Parameter.Name: BX component of Interplanetary Magnetic Field
Parameter.Description: GSM BX component of IMF.

Parameter.Name: BY component of Interplanetary Magnetic Field
Parameter.Description: GSM BY component of IMF.

Parameter.Name: BZ component of Interplanetary Magnetic Field
Parameter.Description: GSM BZ component of IMF.

Parameter.Name: Calendar advance flag
Parameter.Description: Calendar advance flag (1 if advancing calendar time), which means the model is advancing with time with realistic Kp and F10.7.

Parameter.Name: Ion/neutral collision factor
Parameter.Description: ion/neutral (O-O+) collision factor

Parameter.Name: CISM/CMIT coupling flag
Parameter.Description: 1 if coupled with Center for Integrated Space Weather Modeling (CISM)/Coupled Magnetospherer-Ionosphere-Thermosphere (CMIT), 0 otherwise

Parameter.Name: Critical cross-over latitude 1
Parameter.Description: cross over latitude (co-latitude) from high to mid-latitude 1

Parameter.Name: Critical cross-over latitude 2
Parameter.Description: cross over latitude (co-latitude) from high to mid-latitude 2

Parameter.Name: CTMT LBC data file
Parameter.Description: CTMT LBC data file. This is a 2 dimensional array: 1024x24.

Parameter.Name: Cross-tail potential
Parameter.Description: Cross-tail potential.

Parameter.Name: Calendar day
Parameter.Description: Calendar day.

Parameter.Name: Amplitude and phase of diurnal tide mode
Parameter.Description: Amplitude and phase of diurnal tide mode (1,1). This is a 2 dimensional array: 2x24. The dimensions are based on the size of the arrays (2x24): dtidedim,time.

Parameter.Name: Peak energy flux in noon sector of the aurora
Parameter.Description: Peak energy flux in noon sector of the aurora.

Parameter.Name: Peak energy flux in midnight sector of the aurora
Parameter.Description: Peak energy flux in midnight sector of the aurora.

Parameter.Name: Column energy input of polar cusp electrons
Parameter.Description: Column energy input of polar cusp electrons.

Parameter.Name: Column energy input of drizzle electrons
Parameter.Description: Column energy input of drizzle electrons.

Parameter.Name: 81-day average 10.7 cm solar flux
Parameter.Description: 81-day average 10.7 cm solar flux.

Parameter.Name: Daily 10.7 cm solar flux
Parameter.Description: Daily 10.7 cm solar flux.

Parameter.Name: Geophysical Indices data file
Parameter.Description: Geophysical Indices data file, which contains Kp, f107, f107a, ctpoten, and power. If the name list variable GPI_NCFILE uses “ICON_Ancillary_GPI” a 7-73 day averaging in F107a is used otherwise the averaging is centered on the day. This is a 2 dimensional array: 1024x24.

Parameter.Name: Gravitational Acceleration
Parameter.Description: gravitational acceleration, which is a constant used in the model, independent of height. Also see see global attribute for formula).

Parameter.Name: Global Scale Wave Model migrating diurnal tides data file
Parameter.Description: Global Scale Wave Model (GSWM) migrating diurnal tides data file. The lower boundary perturbations for TN, UN, VN, and Z. This is a 2 dimensional array: 1024x24.

Parameter.Name: Global Scale Wave Model migrating semi-diurnal tides data file
Parameter.Description: Global Scale Wave Model (GSWM) migrating semi-diurnal tides data file. The lower boundary perturbations for TN, UN, VN, and Z. This is a 2 dimensional array: 1024x24.

Parameter.Name: Global Scale Wave Model non-migrating diurnal tides data file
Parameter.Description: Global Scale Wave Model (GSWM) non-migrating diurnal tides data file. The lower boundary perturbations for TN, UN, VN, and Z. This is a 2 dimensional array: 1024x24.

Parameter.Name: Global Scale Wave Model non-migrating semi-diurnal tides data file
Parameter.Description: Global Scale Wave Model (GSWM) non-migrating semi-diurnal tides data file. The lower boundary perturbations for TN, UN, VN, and Z. This is a 2 dimensional array: 1024x24.

Parameter.Name: Gaussian half-width of the noon auroral oval
Parameter.Description: Gaussian half-width of the noon auroral oval.

Parameter.Name: Gaussian half-width of the midnight auroral oval
Parameter.Description: Gaussian half-width of the midnight auroral oval.

Parameter.Name: HME file
Parameter.Description: HME file used for lower boundary perturbation. This is a 2 dimensional array: 1024x24.

Parameter.Name: Hemispheric power
Parameter.Description: Hemispheric power.

Parameter.Name: Interface pressure coordinate
Parameter.Description: Interface levels. ln(p0/p). Atmosphere ln pressure coordinate. p(k) = p0 * exp(-ilev(k))

Parameter.Name: Interplanetary Magnetic Field Data file
Parameter.Description: IMF data file. GSM Bx, GSM By, GSM Bz, Swvel, Swden, Kp, f107, and f107a. This is a 2 dimensional array: 1024x24.

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Interface Pressure Coordinate
Parameter.Description: Magnetic interface levels. ln(p0/p). Atmosphere ln pressure coordinate. p(k) = p0 * exp(-imlev(k))

Parameter.Name: Number of Time Steps from Model Time
Parameter.Description: number of time steps from model time 0,0,0.

Parameter.Name: Joule Heating Factor
Parameter.Description: Joule heating factor.

Parameter.Name: Geographic Latitude
Parameter.Description: Geographic latitude (-south, +north).

Parameter.Name: Midpoint Pressure Coordinate
Parameter.Description: Midpoint levels. ln(p0/p). Atmosphere ln pressure coordinate. p(k) = p0 * exp(-lev(k))

Parameter.Name: Geographic Longitude
Parameter.Description: Geographic longitude (-west, +east).

Parameter.Name: Geographic Latitutde and Longitude coordinates of S,N magnetic poles
Parameter.Description: Geographic lat and lon coordinates of S,N magnetic poles.

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Latitude
Parameter.Description: Magnetic latitude (-south, +north).

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Midpoint Levels
Parameter.Description: Magnetic midpoint levels. ln(p0/p). Atmosphere ln pressure coordinate. p(k) = p0 * exp(-mlev(k))

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Longitude
Parameter.Description: Magnetic longitude (-west, +east).

Parameter.Name: Model Times (day, hour, minute)
Parameter.Description: Model times (day, hour, minute).

Parameter.Name: NCEP Data File
Parameter.Description: NCEP data file. 10 mb lower boundary for TN and Z. This is a 2 dimensional array: 1024x24.

Parameter.Name: Number of MPI tasks
Parameter.Description: Number of MPI tasks.

Parameter.Name: Reference pressure
Parameter.Description: Reference pressure.

Parameter.Name: Reference pressure (as used by the model)
Parameter.Description: Reference pressure (as used by the model).

Parameter.Name: SABER Lower Boundary Condition data file
Parameter.Description: SABER lbc data file (T,Z). This is a 2 dimensional array: 1024x24.

Parameter.Name: Amplitudes and Phases of semi-diurnal tide
Parameter.Description: Amplitudes and phases of semi-diurnal tide. This is a 2 dimensional array: 1024x24.

Parameter.Name: TIMED SEE data file
Parameter.Description: TIMED SEE data file. This is a 2 dimensional array: 1024x24.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind Density
Parameter.Description: Solar wind density.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind Velocity
Parameter.Description: Solar Wind Velocity.

Parameter.Name: TGCMLB file
Parameter.Description: TIEGCM lower boundary file used for lower boundary perturbation. This is a 2 dimensional array: 1024x24.

Parameter.Name: TIDI Lower Boundary Conditions Data File
Parameter.Description: TIDI lower boundary conditions data file. This is a 2 dimensional array: 1024x24.

Parameter.Name: Time
Parameter.Description: Time minutes since an initial start.

Parameter.Name: Time Step
Parameter.Description: Timestep size.

Parameter.Name: Universal Time
Parameter.Description: Universal time (from model time hour and minute).

Parameter.Name: Write Time Date and History
Parameter.Description: Date and time each history was written.

Parameter.Name: Calendar Year
Parameter.Description: Calendar year.
